entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Thank goodness for statues and monuments! If not for them you would have to talk about the record we broke yesterday for the most Covid-19 infections in a 24 hour period(Coronavirus Disease 2019, so you don't forget) over 50,000 new infections! #TrumpIsLosing
